attributes.action: Allow anonymous reporting of illegal number plates so they can be removed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day I see plenty of vehicles with illegal number plates. They have numbers made into letters, wrong spacings, and bits cut off or added to make up letters.  This makes it hard to identify vehicles.  It should be possible to anonymously report offending vehicles online, by letter, or by phone to the DVLA.  Owners of these vehicles should be fined and if the offence repeated, have the number plate confiscated.
